title: Watch face CAT
summary: The first watch face with a Catalan identity.
description: Put Catalonia in your watch and shows the land you love !It's the first set of watch faces with a Catalonian identity. Install the full package that includes different interactive watch faces of the Senyera and the Estelada flags.You can choose between analog or digital set of watch faces and combine them with the classic or the artistic version. It is designed for all types of watches, both round and square.After installing the application on Android Wear you could select the set of analog watch faces ("CAT Analog") or digital ("CAT digital"). In order to change the watch face the latest version of Android Wear is needed.Characteristics:* Two different sets of watch faces: analog and digital.* Interactive watch faces: tap to change the current watch face to the next.* Includes two different watch faces of the Catalan and four of the Estelada flag.* Watch faces inn classical and artistic version.* Indicator of the battery level with percentage.* Minimalist and clear design, for round and square watches.* Digital watch faces show:      · Time format 24 / 12h      · Seconds (active mode)      · Day of the week.      · Full date (year, month, day)* Energy saving management with the ambient mode to extend the battery life.* Compatible with Android 6 (Marshmallow).
descriptionHTML:
Put Catalonia in your watch and shows the land you love !


It's the first set of watch faces with a Catalonian identity. Install the full package that includes different interactive watch faces of the Senyera and the Estelada flags.


You can choose between analog or digital set of watch faces and combine them with the classic or the artistic version. It is designed for all types of watches, both round and square.


After installing the application on Android Wear you could select the set of analog watch faces ("CAT Analog") or digital ("CAT digital"). In order to change the watch face the latest version of Android Wear is needed.


Characteristics:

* Two different sets of watch faces: analog and digital.
* Interactive watch faces: tap to change the current watch face to the next.
* Includes two different watch faces of the Catalan and four of the Estelada flag.
* Watch faces inn classical and artistic version.
* Indicator of the battery level with percentage.
* Minimalist and clear design, for round and square watches.
* Digital watch faces show:
· Time format 24 / 12h
· Seconds (active mode)
· Day of the week.
· Full date (year, month, day)
* Energy saving management with the ambient mode to extend the battery life.
* Compatible with Android 6 (Marshmallow).
recentChanges: Added a lock / unlock of the watch face change.
